Episodes.Title: On the Jones
Episodes.Plot: With the Barn grieving over the loss of one of their own, Vic's out to avenge his friend's murder, but finds himself in the crosshairs of Kavanaugh.  Claudette assigns the Strike Team to investigate the torching of a methadone clinic.  Meanwhile, Julien and Tina look into a robbery/assault at a porno shop, and Dutch makes a horrifying discovery in San Marcos.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Forest Whitaker, David Marciano, Nigel Gibbs, Paula Garcés, Onahoua Rodriguez, Harvey Silver, Joseph D. Reitman

Episodes.Title: Baptism by Fire
Episodes.Plot: Kavanaugh acquires what he needs in order to apprehend Vic who is preoccupied with getting revenge on Guardo.  Claudette finds herself under the political microscope as a result of the San Marcos incident, and Danny receives some news about her future at the Barn.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Forest Whitaker, David Marciano, Paula Garcés, Onahoua Rodriguez, Lela Loren, Al Israel, Jordi Caballero, Miguel Nájera

Episodes.Title: Back to One
Episodes.Plot: Consumed by bloodlust, Vic finally gets the chance to avenge his friend's murder, despite Shane's pleas against it. Meanwhile, Ronnie is assigned by Claudette to help Dutch and Billings investigate a robbery homicide at a pharmacy.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Ken Jeong, David Marciano, Paula Garcés, Luis Antonio Ramos, Lela Loren, Julie Dretzin, Lindsay Hollister, Nicole Randall Johnson

Episodes.Title: The New Guy
Episodes.Plot: Claudette gives Vic a chance to save his job if he agrees to train his potential replacement. An unsolved rape case from the past that Dutch and Claudette were working on resurfaces. Meanwhile, Aceveda meets someone that can help him further his political career.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Alex O'Loughlin, David Marciano, F.J. Rio, Fred Toma, Angela Hughes, Hosea Chanchez, Cherrelle Noyd

Episodes.Title: Haunts
Episodes.Plot: After being badly beaten, Shane's life spirals even more out of control as his guilt continues to eat away at him and his marriage begins to fall apart. Vic and Ronnie try to learn who was responsible for Shane's attack.  Meanwhile, under the new leadership of Kevin Hiatt, Claudette assigns the Strike Team to investigate the San Marcos murders. Dutch and Billings make  progress in a serial rapist case.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Alex O'Loughlin, David Marciano, Michele Hicks, Carl Weathers, F.J. Rio, Brian Howe, Patrick St. Esprit, Gary Wolf, Angela Hughes, Cherrelle Noyd, Clifton Collins, Jr.

Episodes.Title: Chasing Ghosts
Episodes.Plot: Vic redirects his attention to finding out who really killed Lem after he learns for certain that Guardo wasn't involved. The Strike Team investigates the murder of a politician's daughter. Later, Cassidy confronts her father about his unethical past.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Anthony Anderson, Alex O'Loughlin, David Marciano, Paula Garcés, Lela Loren, Michael Bofshever, Victor Togunde, Rebecca Lowman, Kyle Davis

Episodes.Title: Exiled
Episodes.Plot: After Vic disowns him, Shane turns to the Armenian mob for help.  Vic gets more involved with the San Marcos investigation, while Dutch and Billings are able to track down someone who survived the massacre.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Katey Sagal, Alex O'Loughlin, David Marciano, Michele Hicks, Nigel Gibbs, Paula Garcés, F.J. Rio, Kevin McCorkle, Nasser Faris, Clifton Collins, Jr.

Episodes.Title: The Math of the Wrath
Episodes.Plot: Vic learns about his true status at the Barn from Hiatt. Shane gets involved with the daughter of an Armenian mob boss. Claudette begins to question Hiatt's loyalty.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Alex O'Loughlin, David Marciano, Paula Garcés, F.J. Rio, Kevin McCorkle, Franka Potente

Episodes.Title: Recoil
Episodes.Plot: As progress is being made in the San Marcos investigation, Vic receives bad news about his career. Meanwhile, Shane and Diro become business partners as she prepares to take over the Armenian mob.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.Writer: Adam E. Fierro, Elizabeth Craft, Sarah Fain
Episodes.GuestStars: Alex O'Loughlin, David Marciano, Paula Garcés, F.J. Rio, Seth Peterson, Michael Bofshever, Franka Potente

Episodes.Title: Spanish Practices
Episodes.Plot: Claudette notices Hiatt's mistake when he makes an arrest, and Billings delivers shocking news to the department. Vic forms an alliance with Aceveda, while he waits for his review board hearing. Meanwhile, Shane's life keeps spiraling out of control.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Christopher Cousins, Alex O'Loughlin, David Marciano, Paula Garcés, F.J. Rio, Franka Potente
